channel.title: Ramblings on d:tour
channel.description: Recent content in Ramblings on d:tour

item.title: Ideas, thoughts, & ramblings.....
item.description: Ideas, thoughts & Ramblings… that’s what this blog is all about. After spending a few days playing around with Hugo offline, I’ve discovered that I actually quite like it. It’s like a refreshing change. A Fresh Start.. Initially, my plan was to transfer all my old blog posts from Publii to this new blog. However, upon reflection, I decided against it. A few of those posts were of low quality, and frankly, I have no idea why I ever published them.
